import { Component, Inject } from '@angular/core'; import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; @Component({ selector: 'app-view', templateUrl: './view.component.html' }) export class ViewComponent { public transaction: Transaction; constructor(http: HttpClient) { http.get('/api/transaction').subscribe(result => { this.transaction = result; }, error => console.error(error)); } //constructor(http: HttpClient, @Inject('BASE_URL') baseUrl: string) { // http.get(baseUrl + 'weatherforecast').subscribe(result => { // this.forecasts = result; // }, error => console.error(error)); //} } interface Transaction { id: number name: string; date: string; cost: number; }
